title.narrative: Creating a Space, Raising a Voice: Protecting and Empowering Adolescent Girls in Humanitarian Contexts

description.narrative: The proposed project will promote the safety, resilience, wellbeing, and empowerment of adolescent girls in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ethiopia and Pakistan. All of these countries are experiencing humanitarian crises which create major challenges to adolescent girls’ safety from violence. Girls can only reach their full potential – to be healthy, happy, productive, and thus contributing members of their communities, if they are both free from violence and the fear of violence, as well as supported with opportunities – social, educational, economic and physical – that remain overwhelmingly closed to them.

participating-org.narrative: The Trustees of Columbia University in the City of New York
